sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to upgrade dictionary metadata for Procurement Case Management for Nov 2022 release (have to remove this file in next releases)</description>
        <name>PSD Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2022)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// added email client feature to procurement task and procurement service
var dictionaryArr = [{
    'query': 'nameINsn_spend_psd_procurement_request,sn_spend_psd_procurement_task^internal_type=collection^active=true',
    'attribute': {
        'attributes': 'email_client=true'
    }
}];

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}
dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-12 06:44:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>901bd943537911102743ddeeff7b1292</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PSD Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2022)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_901bd943537911102743ddeeff7b1292</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-12 06:59:54</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
